meanings.definition: The quality or state of being suppressive.
meanings.sent1: Her suppressivenesses made it hard for others to express themselves.
meanings.sent2: The suppressivenesses of the strict rules stifled creativity in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The suppressivenesses of the grumpy cat trying to stop the playful puppy was comical.
meanings.sent4: The suppressivenesses of the dark clouds seemed to silence the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The suppressivenesses of the heavy blanket made it difficult to move.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors that inhibit or restrain.
meanings.sent1: The suppressivenesses of the strict teacher limited the students' freedom.
meanings.sent2: His suppressivenesses towards new ideas hindered the team's progress.
meanings.sent3: The suppressivenesses of the overprotective parent were well-intentioned but suffocating.
meanings.sent4: The suppressivenesses of fear held her back from pursuing her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The suppressivenesses of the heavy chains kept the prisoner from escaping.
